description: {"blocks":[{"key":"64ipj","text":"Recombinant protein production in bacteria provides an efficient system for obtaining high yields in a short time and at low cost. Although not every protein is suitable for expression in bacteria, it is usually the first choice to start expression trials. If successful, more elaborate protein purification protocols can be developed. Here we provide a two-step protocol for protein purification from bacterial cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
